name: Cloaky In The Lost Forest
description:
This is my 2D Platformer Project.

Sprites were taken and edited by me for this game.

3 Major Changes- Reskinned tilemaps, New Player Sprite, Added in Directional Signs to help you get to your destination.

Note: 

  • I have observed that the repurposed ground tilemap creates weird visionary. 
  • The tiles are also rigid so you can stick to the walls if you hold the arrow key in its direction but that can be used to maneuver if you please.  
  • I am now aware that when planning levels I should take into consideration the flow and create diagrams to help me visualize creation better.
  • In Level 2 the extra life item was not reskinned to look like the player sprite as it was in level 1.

I will only get better from here. More projects to come!
